song_lyrics: Fūlno dhariyo re, mugaṭ fūlno dhariyo,
Helī Mohanjī marmāḷe, mugaṭ fūlno dhariyo...
Torā guchchh taṇo na jāye, varṇan kariyo. 1
Gajrā bāju hār hajārī, pe’rī ḍolariyo,
Fūl pachheḍī oḍhī mārā, manḍāne hariyo,
Fūl chākhḍīyu pe’rī chaṭchaṭ, chāle Naṭvariyo,
Premānand ke’ evo āvī, antarmā gariyo. 4
title: Fūlno dhariyo re mugaṭ fūlno dhariyo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-9014: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
